revision.text: {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Professor Oak || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pallet Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Mom || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pallet Town]] || Tells the player about the NPCs. |- | Old Man || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Viridian City]] || Teaches the player how to use the [[Pokéballs|Pokéball]] menu. |- | Battle Master || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pewter City]] || Teaches the player about the use of [[Battle Items]]. |- | Gem Scientist || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Pewter City]] || Tells the player about the [[Gems]] usage and how to get. |- | Shady Salesman || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Route 3 Pokécenter]] || Tells the player about the Magikarp. |- | Berry Master || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cerulean City]] || Gives the player hints about [[Berries|berry]] farming. |- | Super Nerd || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cerulean City]] || Tells the player to download saves more frequently. |- | Fan Club Chairman || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Vermilion City]] || Informs the player about Typed [[Eggs]] |- | Mr. Fuji || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Lavender Town]] || Informs the player about increased rates of [[Shinies|Shiny Pokémon]] |- | Battle Master 2 || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Saffron City]] || Teaches the player about stacking Battle Items. |- | Breeder || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Saffron City]] || Teaches the player about breeding pokémons. |- | Big Spender || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Celadon City]] || Teaches the player about the [[Shops|Shop]] amount button. |- | Youngster Wendy || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Fuchsia City]] || Informs the player about increased [[Roaming Pokémon]] rates. |- | Researcher || [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Cinnabar Island]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Mew. |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
